hero.title: Kuwezesha biashara
hero.subtitle: kustawi kimataifa
hero.description: Tunajenga mfumo wa uendeshaji kwa biashara ndogo za kisasa, tukifanya zana za kiwango cha makampuni zipatikane kwa kila mtu.

story.title: Hadithi Yetu
story.paragraph1: Dott ilizaliwa kutoka uchunguzi rahisi: biashara ndogo zilikuwa zikizama katika ugumu. Zana nyingi, data iliyotenganishwa, na michakato iliyoundwa kwa makampuni ilikuwa ikizuia wajasiriamali ulimwenguni kote.
story.paragraph2: Iliyoanzishwa mnamo 2023, tulianza kujenga kitu tofauti. Jukwaa linalolewa changamoto za kipekee za biashara ndogo, hasa katika masoko yanayoibuka ambapo suluhisho za jadi zinashindwa.
story.paragraph3: Leo, tunajivunia kutumikia biashara ulimwenguni kote. Lakini tumeanza tu.

beginning.title: Mwanzo
beginning.description: Ilitambua hitaji la zana za usimamizi wa biashara zilizounganishwa kwa SMB

launch.title: Uzinduzi wa Bidhaa
launch.description: Ilizindua jukwaa kuu lenye usimamizi wa fedha na hesabu

expansion.title: Upanuzi wa Kimataifa
expansion.description: Ilipanuka kwa nchi zaidi ya 25 na vipengele vya ndani

ai.title: Ushirikiano wa AI
ai.description: Kuanzisha maarifa ya akili na otomatiki

mission.title: Dhamira Yetu
mission.description: Kuwezesha usimamizi wa biashara kwa kuwapa biashara ndogo zana zenye nguvu, zinazopatikana ambazo hurahisisha shughuli na kuwezesha ukuaji, bila kujali mahali au utaalam wa kiufundi.

vision.title: Maono Yetu
vision.description: Ulimwengu ambapo kila biashara ndogo ina ufikiaji wa ubora sawa wa zana za usimamizi kama makampuni ya Fortune 500, kuwezesha biashara milioni moja kustawi ifikapo 2030.

simplicity.title: Urahisi Kwanza
simplicity.description: Shughuli ngumu za biashara zilizofanywa kuwa rahisi kupitia muundo wa angavu

innovation.title: Ubunifu Endelevu
innovation.description: Kukua na mahitaji yanayobadilika ya biashara ya kisasa

success.title: Mafanikio ya Wateja
success.description: Ukuaji wako ni mafanikio yetu - tunashinda unaposhinda

empowerment.title: Uwezeshaji wa Kimataifa
empowerment.description: Kuvunja vizuizi kwa biashara ulimwenguni kote

unified.title: Jukwaa Lililounganishwa
unified.description: Zana zako zote za biashara mahali pamoja

global.title: Kimataifa, Lakini ya Ndani
global.description: Viwango vya kimataifa na utii wa ndani

security.title: Usalama wa Biashara
security.description: Ulinzi wa kiwango cha benki kwa data yako

insights.title: Maarifa ya Akili
insights.description: Uchambuzi unaotumia AI kwa maamuzi bora

features.heading: Kila Kitu Unachohitaji Kukua Kimataifa
features.subheading: Zana zenye nguvu zilizoundwa kwa biashara za kisasa zinazofanya kazi kupitia mipaka

operations.title: Usimamizi wa Uendeshaji
operations.description: Rahisisha shughuli zako za biashara za kila siku

financial.title: Usimamizi wa Kifedha
financial.description: Udhibiti kamili wa fedha za biashara yako

global.title: Zana za Biashara ya Kimataifa
global.description: Kila kitu unachohitaji kufanya biashara kimataifa

trust.title: Imejengwa kwa Usalama na Kufuata Sheria

pricing.heading: Chagua Mpango Muafaka kwa Biashara Yako
pricing.subheading: Hakuna ada zilizofichwa. Hakuna kadi ya mkopo inayohitajika kwa mpango wa Msingi. Futa wakati wowote.

discount.title: Punguzo la 50% kwa Mipango Yote ya Kulipa!
discount.subtitle: Bei maalum kwa biashara {{country}} - Kuunga mkono ujasiriamali wa mtaa

basic.name: Msingi
basic.description: Kamili kwa wafanyabiashara huru na biashara ndogo

enterprise.name: Shirika
enterprise.description: Ukuaji usio na kikomo kwa mashirika makubwa

features.barcodePrint: Uchapishaji wa Msimbo wa Pau wa Kibinafsi

highlights.heading: Kwa nini biashara zinachagua Dott
highlights.subheading: Vipengele vya hali ya juu vinavyotutofautisha na ushindani na kusaidia biashara yako kukua.

mobile.title: Programu ya Simu
mobile.description: Fikia data ya biashara yako wakati wowote, popote na programu yetu yenye nguvu ya simu. Simamia bidhaa, chakata mauzo na ona ripoti za wakati halisi unapotembea.
mobile.imageAlt: Picha ya skrini ya programu ya simu

pos.title: Mfumo wa Mauzo na Usomaji wa Msimbo wa Pau
pos.description: Badilisha kifaa chochote kuwa mfumo wenye nguvu wa mauzo. Soma msimbo wa pau papo hapo, chakata mauzo haraka, fuatilia bidhaa za hifadhi wakati halisi na kubali njia zote za malipo ikijumuisha pesa taslimu, kadi na pesa za simu.
pos.imageAlt: Mfumo wa mauzo na kipengele cha usomaji wa msimbo wa pau

ai.title: Ufahamu wa Akili Bandia
ai.description: Pata mapendekezo ya akili na uchambuzi wa utabiri kulingana na data ya biashara yako. AI yetu inakusaidia kutabiri mahitaji, kuboresha bidhaa za hifadhi na kutambua fursa za ukuaji.
ai.imageAlt: Picha ya skrini ya dashibodi ya uchambuzi wa AI

geofencing.title: Geofencing na Ufuatiliaji wa Mahali
geofencing.description: Hakikisha ufuatiliaji sahihi wa muda na kuingia/kutoka kwa msingi wa GPS. Bora kwa timu za uwandani, madereva wa uwasilishaji na wafanyakazi wa mbali. Weka mipaka ya kipepo kwa maeneo ya kazi na upokee tahadhari wakati wafanyakazi wakiingia au kutoka maeneo yaliyoteuliwa.
geofencing.imageAlt: Kiolesura cha geofencing na ufuatiliaji wa mahali

mobilemoney.title: Malipo ya Pesa za Simu
mobilemoney.description: Kubali malipo kutoka popote duniani. Uunganishaji wa M-Pesa una nguvu Kenya, na MTN Mobile Money, Airtel Money, Orange Money, GCash, Paytm, Pix na Mercado Pago zinakuja hivi karibuni. Fikia mabilioni ya wateja wanaopendelea pesa za simu kuliko huduma za benki za jadi.
mobilemoney.imageAlt: Chaguo za malipo ya pesa za simu

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Business
whatsapp.description: Badilisha mawasiliano ya wateja kupitia muunganiko wa WhatsApp Business. Unda na usimamie katalogi yako ya bidhaa, tuma bili na risiti kiotomatiki, toa msaada wa papo hapo kwa wateja, na unganisha nao kwenye jukwaa lao la ujumbe la kipendwa.

languages.title: Lugha Zaidi ya 20 Zinazosaidwa
languages.description: Fikia wateja na simamia biashara yako kwa lugha unayoipendelea. Kutoka Kiingereza hadi Kiswahili, Kihispania hadi Kichina, tunasaidia lugha zaidi ya 20 ili kufanya Dott iwe rahisi kwa biashara duniani kote.
languages.imageAlt: Onyesho la kiolesura cha kilugha nyingi

jobs.title: Usimamizi Kamili wa Kazi
jobs.description: Ukadiriaji wa gharama za kazi kutoka nukuu hadi kukamilika. Fuatilia vifaa, kazi na matumizi kwa uchanganuzi wa faida ya wakati halisi. Kamili kwa biashara za huduma, makandarasi na shughuli za uwandani zenye muundo wa simu ya kwanza.
jobs.imageAlt: Kiolesura cha usimamizi wa kazi na ukadiriaji wa gharama

features.jobCosting: Ukadiriaji wa gharama za kazi wakati halisi

highlights.jobCosting: Ukadiriaji wa gharama za kazi wakati halisi
highlights.mobileFieldApp: Programu ya simu kwa wafanyakazi wa uwandani
highlights.gaap: US GAAP kwa biashara za Marekani
highlights.realTimeRates: Viwango vya ubadilishaji wa wakati halisi

contact.heading: Ongea nasi
contact.subheading: Una maswali kuhusu Dott? Timu yetu iko hapa kukusaidia kupata suluhisho kamili kwa biashara yako.
contact.infoSubtitle: Jaza fomu au wasiliana nasi moja kwa moja kwa kutumia taarifa hapa chini.
contact.success: Asante kwa kutufikia! Tutakupigia upande huu hivi karibuni.

email.invalid: Tafadhali ingiza anwani halali ya barua pepe

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At Dott LLC, we value your trust and respect your privacy. We exist to provide businesses with comprehensive financial management tools. This Privacy Policy explains—in clear and plain language—what information we collect, how we use it, and the choices you have regarding your personal information, so you can feel confident about using our platform.

scope.title: A. Scope
scope.content: Protecting your personal information is important to us. This privacy policy applies to our products and services offered under the Dott brand, our websites, and our mobile applications that incorporate this privacy policy. Our products and services are offered by Dott LLC. This policy covers how we collect, use, store, process, and share your information in connection with our financial management platform, including accounting, payroll, payment processing, invoicing, and other services.

personalInfo.title: B. Personal Information
personalInfo.content: As part of providing our services, we may collect personal information about you, your business, your employees, and your customers. 'Personal Information' is data that can be used to identify a person individually. This policy outlines our collection, protection, use, retention, disclosure and other processing of Personal Information and your rights relating to these activities.

businessInfo.title: B.1 Business Information
businessInfo.content: This includes your business name, address, tax identification numbers, industry type, business entity type, and other information necessary to provide our services.

individualInfo.title: B.2 Individual Information
individualInfo.content: This includes information about you as a business owner, your employees, contractors, and your customers, as necessary to provide our services.

categories.title: C. Categories of Personal Information Collected
categories.content: The information we may collect includes, but is not limited to:

identification.title: C.1 Identification Information
identification.content: Contact Information (name, email address, phone number, postal address), Government Identification Numbers (EIN, SSN, tax IDs), Date of Birth, photographic ID, and business documentation.

financial.title: C.2 Financial Information
financial.content: Bank account details, payment card information, transaction history, account balances, payment records, credit history, financial statements, and payroll information.

employee.title: C.3 Employee Information
employee.content: For payroll services, we collect information about your employees including their names, contact details, salary information, tax withholding information, bank details for direct deposit, and other employment-related data.

technical.title: C.4 Technical Information
technical.content: Device Information (IP address, device type, operating system), Browser Information, Geo-Location Data, Usage Data, Login Information, and Application Interaction Data.

customer.title: C.5 Customer Information
customer.content: When you use our invoicing or payment processing features, we may collect information about your customers necessary to process these transactions.

tax.title: C.6 Tax Information
tax.content: When you use our tax features, we collect your business location, tax rates you enter, tax settings preferences, and tax calculation history. We may also process tax-related queries when you use our AI-powered tax suggestion features. This information is used solely to provide tax calculation services and is not used for tax filing or reporting on your behalf.

collection.title: D. How We Collect Your Information
collection.content: We collect information from various sources:

direct.title: D.1 Direct Collection
direct.content: Information you provide when you register for our services, set up your account, connect your financial accounts, process payments, or communicate with us.

automated.title: D.2 Automated Collection
automated.content: Information collected automatically through cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies when you use our services.

thirdParty.title: D.3 Third-Party Sources
thirdParty.content: Information we receive from third-party service providers, business partners, identity verification services, credit bureaus, and other publicly available sources.

financial.title: D.4 Financial Institutions
financial.content: When you connect your bank accounts or other financial services to Dott, we collect information from these financial institutions with your authorization.

usage.title: E. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:

services.title: E.1 Providing and Improving Our Services
services.content: To deliver the financial management services you request, process transactions, facilitate payments, manage invoices, process payroll, provide technical support, and improve our platform.

security.title: E.2 Authentication and Security
security.content: To verify your identity, secure your account, prevent fraud, and ensure the security of our platform.

communications.title: E.3 Communications
communications.content: To communicate with you about your account, provide customer support, send service updates, and, with your consent, send marketing communications.

compliance.title: E.4 Legal Compliance
compliance.content: To comply with our legal obligations, including anti-money laundering regulations, tax reporting requirements, and other financial services regulations.

analytics.title: E.5 Analytics and Improvements
analytics.content: To analyze usage patterns, troubleshoot technical issues, and develop new features and services.

sharing.title: F. Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We may share your information with the following categories of recipients:

providers.title: F.1 Service Providers
providers.content: Third-party service providers who help us deliver our services, including payment processors (Stripe, Flutterwave, DLocal, Wise, PayPal), hosting providers, customer support services, and analytics providers.

partners.title: F.2 Financial Partners
partners.content: Banks and financial institutions necessary to process transactions, facilitate payments, and provide invoice factoring services.

authorities.title: F.3 Legal and Regulatory Authorities
authorities.content: Government authorities, law enforcement, and other third parties where required by law, to comply with legal process, or to protect our rights.

transfers.title: F.4 Business Transfers
transfers.content: In connection with any merger, acquisition, or sale of company assets, your information may be transferred as a business asset.

consent.title: F.5 With Your Consent
consent.content: We may share your information with other third parties when you have given your consent to do so.

rights.title: G. Your Choices and Rights
rights.content: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:

access.title: G.1 Access and Portability
access.content: You may request access to your personal information and receive a copy in a structured, commonly used format.

correction.title: G.2 Correction
correction.content: You may request that we correct inaccurate or incomplete personal information.

deletion.title: G.3 Deletion
deletion.content: You may request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.

objection.title: G.4 Objection and Restriction
objection.content: You may object to or request restriction of processing of your personal information.

withdraw.title: G.5 Withdraw Consent
withdraw.content: Where we rely on your consent to process your personal information, you may withdraw your consent at any time.

exercise.title: G.6 How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.content: To exercise your rights, please contact us at support@dottapps.com We may need to verify your identity before fulfilling your request.

security.title: H. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:

measures.title: H.1 Security Measures
measures.content: We use industry-standard security measures including encryption, access controls, firewalls, and regular security assessments.

payment.title: H.2 Payment Information
payment.content: Payment information is processed in compliance with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS).

access.title: H.3 Employee Access
access.content: We restrict employee access to personal information to those who need it to perform their job functions.

breach.title: H.4 Data Breach Procedures
breach.content: We have procedures in place to respond to suspected data security breaches and will notify you and applicable regulators of breaches as required by law.

tax.title: H.5 Tax Data Security
tax.content: Tax rates and settings you enter are encrypted and stored securely. AI-powered tax suggestions are processed without storing your specific queries. We do not share your tax configuration data with third parties except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. You remain responsible for the accuracy of all tax information entered into our system.

retention.title: I. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and for legitimate business purposes, such as maintaining business records, complying with legal obligations, resolving disputes, and enforcing our agreements. When we no longer need your personal information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

transfers.title: J. International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than the country you live in, including the United States, Rwanda, and other countries where Dott LLC or its service providers operate. These countries may have data protection laws different from the laws of your country. We implement appropriate safeguards to protect your information when transferred internationally, such as standard contractual clauses approved by relevant data protection authorities.

children.title: K. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we can delete the information.

cookies.title: L. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about how you interact with our services, to remember your preferences, and to optimize your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

types.title: L.1 Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: Essential cookies (necessary for the functionality of our services), Analytical cookies (to understand how users interact with our services), and Marketing cookies (to deliver relevant advertisements).

choices.title: L.2 Your Cookie Choices
choices.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. However, if you reject certain cookies, you may not be able to use all features of our services.

ai.title: M. AI and Automated Processing
ai.content: We use artificial intelligence and automated systems to enhance our services and provide features like tax rate suggestions, financial insights, and fraud detection.

features.title: M.1 AI-Powered Features
features.content: Our AI features analyze your location and business type to suggest tax rates and provide other business insights. These suggestions are generated based on publicly available information and general tax rules.

advice.title: M.2 No Professional Advice
advice.content: AI-generated suggestions, including tax rate recommendations, are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute professional tax, legal, or financial advice. You should independently verify all suggestions before using them.

review.title: M.3 Human Review
review.content: Significant automated decisions that may have legal or similarly significant effects on you are subject to human review upon request.

changes.title: N. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new version on our website and updating the effective date. We encourage you to review our privacy policy periodically.

contact.title: O. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, or if you wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal information, please contact us at:

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Dott LLC uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website and use our services. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners in order to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.

howWeUseCookies.title: How we use cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies for several reasons. Some cookies are required for technical reasons in order for our website to operate, and we refer to these as "essential" or "strictly necessary" cookies. Other cookies enable us to track and target the interests of our users to enhance the experience on our website.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of cookies we use
typesOfCookies.content: The specific types of first and third party cookies served through our website and the purposes they perform are described below:

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.content: These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with services available through our website and to use some of its features, such as access to secure areas.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.content: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.content: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources, so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.content: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.

managingCookies.title: Managing cookies
managingCookies.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. However, if you limit the ability of websites to set cookies, you may worsen your overall user experience, since it will no longer be personalized to you. It may also stop you from saving customized settings like login information.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-party cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics of our service and deliver advertisements on and through our service.

changes.title: Changes to this Cookie Policy
changes.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time in order to reflect changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons. Please therefore revisit this Cookie Policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies and related technologies.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or other technologies, please contact us.

aboutDescription1: Ilianzishwa mwaka 2023, Dott ni jukwaa kamili la usimamizi wa biashara lililobuniwa haswa kwa biashara ndogo, wafanyakazi huru, washauri, na biashara ndogo sana.
aboutDescription2: Kinachoifanya Dott iwe tofauti ni uelewa wetu wa kina wa changamoto za kipekee zinazokumba biashara ndogo, hasa katika masoko yanayoibuka.
missionStatement: Katika Dott, dhamira yetu ni kuwezesha biashara ndogo kustawi kwa kuwapa zana za usimamizi zinazofikika, zinazoweza kupatikana, na zenye nguvu ambazo hurahisisha shughuli za kila siku.
visionStatement: Tunaona ulimwengu ambapo biashara ndogo zina ufikiaji wa ubora sawa wa zana za usimamizi kama mashirika makubwa, lakini zimetengenezwa kulingana na mahitaji yao mahususi na ukubwa.

hero.tagline: MIFUMO YA KISASA YA USIMAMIZI WA BIASHARA
hero.title: Jukwaa la Biashara la Kimataifa
hero.subtitle: Bure milele kwa vipengele vya msingi
hero.description: Usimamizi wa biashara wa kimataifa ukiwa na udhibiti wa bidhaa wa hali ya juu, usomaji wa msimbo wa pau, na suluhisho za malipo za kikanda - vyote katika jukwaa moja rahisi kwa biashara duniani kote.
hero.trustedBy: Inaaminika na biashara zaidi ya 10,000 duniani kote
hero.paymentNote: Ada za uchakataji wa malipo zinaweza kutumika kwa aina fulani za miamala

benefit.payroll: Zana za mishahara na rasilimali watu
benefit.mobilePhone: Programu ya simu ya mkononi imejumuishwa

heroDescription: Usimamizi wa biashara wa kimataifa ukiwa na udhibiti wa bidhaa wa hali ya juu, usomaji wa msimbo wa pau, na suluhisho za malipo za kikanda - vyote katika jukwaa moja rahisi kwa biashara duniani kote.
featuresSubtitle: Kila kitu unachohitaji kusimamia biashara yako kwa ufanisi katika zaidi ya nchi 100
advancedInventory: Udhibiti wa bidhaa wa hali ya juu
pricingTitle: Kila kitu kimejumuishwa katika Mpango wetu wa Kitaalamu kwa $15/mwezi tu
pricingDescription: Hakuna ada zilizofichwa. Hakuna gharama za ziada za uchapishaji wa msimbo wa pau au uunganishaji wa skana.
feature_global_accounting_desc: Zana za uhasibu rahisi kutumia zinazounga mkono sarafu nyingi na mifumo ya kodi kwa biashara popote duniani.
feature_inventory_&_barcode_management: Udhibiti wa Bidhaa na Msimbo wa Pau
feature_inventory_&_barcode_management_d: Fuatilia viwango vya bidhaa, chapisha msimbo wa pau, na unganisha na skana za Bluetooth kwa udhibiti wa bidhaa wenye ufanisi.
feature_worldwide_payment_solutions: Suluhisho za Malipo za Duniani Kote
feature_worldwide_payment_solutions_desc: Pokea malipo ulimwenguni kote kupitia kadi za mikopo, uhamisho wa benki, pesa za simu, na njia za malipo za kikanda.
feature_payroll_&_hr_desc: Simamia wafanyakazi, mishahara, faida, na nyaraka za rasilimali watu zote mahali pamoja, ukiwa na msaada wa maeneo mengi.
feature_reports_&_analytics_desc: Pata ufahamu kwa ripoti zinazoweza kubinafsishwa, uchanganuzi wa biashara wa moja kwa moja, na mapendekezo yanayoendeshwa na AI.
feature_mobile_money_integration_desc: Pokea malipo kupitia M-Pesa, MTN, Airtel Money na mifumo mingine ya malipo ya simu inayopendwa zaidi Afrika na Asia.
feature_invoicing_&_factoring_desc: Tengeneza ankara za kitaalamu katika sarafu nyingi pamoja na chaguo za factoring kwa biashara za Marekani na Kanada.
feature_cross-border_commerce_desc: Simamia mauzo ya kimataifa, uagizaji, usafirishaji na fuata kanuni za kikodi za kikanda kwa urahisi.
highlights_title: Kwa Nini Uchague Jukwaa Letu la Kimataifa
highlights_subtitle: Imebuniwa kusaidia biashara kutoka nchi mbalimbali na udhibiti wa bidhaa wenye nguvu
highlight_desc_global_business_solution: Imebuniwa kwa biashara duniani kote ikiwa na msaada wa zaidi ya nchi 100, sarafu nyingi, na njia za malipo maalum za kikanda.
highlight_title_advanced_inventory_tools: Zana za Udhibiti wa Bidhaa za Hali ya Juu
highlight_desc_advanced_inventory_tools: Uchapishaji wa msimbo wa pau na uunganishaji wa skana za Bluetooth umejumuishwa katika mpango wetu wa Kitaalamu bila malipo ya ziada.
highlight_desc_fast_&_efficient: Jukwaa linalotegemea wingu lililoimarishwa kwa kasi na ufanisi, linakusaidia kusimamia biashara yako haraka zaidi popote ulipo.
highlight_desc_secure_&_compliant: Usalama wa kiwango cha benki na vipengele vya uzingatiaji wa kikanda huhakikisha data yako ya biashara ni salama na inatimiza kanuni za mtaa.
highlight_desc_global_support: Timu yetu ya msaada iliyojitokeza inaelewa mazingira ya biashara ya mitaa na inapatikana katika majira ya saa mengi na lugha mbali mbali.
highlights_pricing_title: Vipengele vyote, ikijumuisha uchapishaji wa msimbo wa pau na uunganishaji wa skana, vimejumuishwa katika mpango wetu wa Kitaalamu kwa $15/mwezi tu
highlights_pricing_subtitle: Hakuna ada zilizofichwa. Hakuna viwango vya bei vya kugeuza. Mpango mmoja rahisi tu kwa biashara za kimataifa.
faq_subtitle: Una maswali kuhusu jukwaa letu la biashara la kimataifa? Tuna majibu.
faq_a_what_is_dott: Dott ni jukwaa la usimamizi wa biashara la kimataifa linalosaidia biashara katika zaidi ya nchi 100. Linaunganisha uhasibu, mishahara, rasilimali watu, udhibiti wa bidhaa na utendaji wa msimbo wa pau, na chaguo mbalimbali za malipo, ikijumuisha pesa za simu, katika suluhisho moja rahisi.
faq_a_how_much_does_it_cost: Tunatoa mpango wa Msingi wa bure kwa biashara zinazojitokeza na mpango wa Kitaalamu kwa $15/mwezi ($150/mwaka). Mpango wa Kitaalamu unajumuisha vipengele vyote, ikijumuisha uchapishaji wa msimbo wa pau na uunganishaji wa skana, bila ada zilizofichwa. Unaweza kupandisha au kushuka ngazi wakati wowote.
faq_a_which_countries_do_you_support: Dott inasaidia biashara katika zaidi ya nchi 100 ulimwenguni kote, ukiwa na vipengele maalum kwa maeneo maalum kama vile uunganishaji wa pesa za simu Afrika, factoring ya ankara Marekani na Kanada, na zana za uzingatiaji kwa mazingira mbalimbali ya udhibiti.
faq_q_does_dott_support_mobile_money_pay: Je, Dott inaunga mkono malipo ya pesa za simu?
faq_a_does_dott_support_mobile_money_pay: Ndiyo! Tunaunga mkono uunganishaji na majukwaa maarufu ya pesa za simu kama vile M-Pesa, MTN Mobile Money, Airtel Money, na mengine katika Afrika na Asia. Hii huruhusu biashara yako kupokea na kuchakata njia za malipo za mtaa kwa urahisi.
faq_q_how_does_the_barcode_and_inventory: Kipengele cha msomaji wa msimbo wa pau na bidhaa kinafanya kazi vipi?
faq_a_how_does_the_barcode_and_inventory: Mpango wetu wa Kitaalamu unajumuisha uwezo wa kutengeneza na kuchapisha msimbo wa pau kwa bidhaa zako na kuunganisha na skana za msimbo wa pau za Bluetooth kwa udhibiti wa bidhaa wa haraka zaidi. Kipengele hiki kimejumuishwa bila gharama za ziada na kinafanya kazi vizuri na mfumo wetu wa udhibiti wa bidhaa.
faq_a_is_my_data_secure: Kabisa. Tunatumia usimbaji fiche wa usalama wa kiwango cha benki na kufuata desturi bora za tasnia ili kulinda data yako. Jukwaa letu linahifadhiwa kwenye miundombinu salama ya wingu iliyo na safu nyingi za usalama, vipengele vya uzingatiaji wa kikanda, na nakala rudufu za mara kwa mara.
faq_q_can_i_import_data_from_other_syste: Je, ninaweza kuingiza data kutoka kwenye mifumo mingine?
faq_a_can_i_import_data_from_other_syste: Ndiyo, unaweza kuingiza data kutoka formati mbalimbali, ikijumuisha Excel, CSV, na majukwaa mengine ya uhasibu. Pia tunatoa usaidizi wa uhamishaji kwa biashara zinazobadilisha kutoka majukwaa mengine, ukiwa na msaada wa formati za data za kimataifa.
faq_a_what_kind_of_support_do_you_offer: Tunatoa msaada wa wateja kupitia majira ya saa mbalimbali kupitia mazungumzo, barua pepe, na simu zilizopangwa. Timu yetu inajumuisha wataalamu wanaofahamu mazoea ya biashara ya kikanda ili kutoa msaada unaofaa, popote biashara yako inapoendeshwa.
faq_q_how_does_multi-currency_support_wo: Msaada wa sarafu nyingi unafanya kazi vipi?
faq_a_how_does_multi-currency_support_wo: Dott inakuruhusu kufanya kazi na sarafu nyingi kwa wakati mmoja, ukiwa na masasisho ya otomatiki ya viwango vya ubadilishaji. Unaweza kutuma ankara kwa wateja wako katika sarafu zao za mtaa, kufuatilia matumizi katika sarafu tofauti, na kutengeneza ripoti katika sarafu yako ya msingi unayopendelea.
contact_support: Wasiliana na timu yetu ya msaada ya kimataifa kupitia support@dottapps.com
pricing_subtitle: Chagua mpango unaofaa kwa biashara yako
regional_pricing: Bei za kikanda zimetumika: Kiwango cha bure kilichoimarishwa na punguzo la 50% kwa Enterprise ({0})
currency_notice: Bei zinaonyeshwa katika sarafu yako ya mtaa: {0}
developing_country_notice: Vipengele vilivyoimarishwa vinapatikana kwa eneo lako! Bei katika {0}
pricing_footer: Bei hazijumuishi kodi zinazotumika. Usajili unajifanyia upya kiotomatiki. Ghairi wakati wowote.
developing_country_discount: Bei maalum za kikanda zimetumika: Punguzo la 50% kwenye kiwango cha Shirika
feature_advanced_inventory_management_wi: Udhibiti wa bidhaa wa hali ya juu na utabiri

feature_unlimited_income_&_expense_track: Ufuatiliaji wa mapato na matumizi usio na kikomo
feature_advanced_reporting_and_analytics: Ripoti na uchanganuzi wa hali ya juu
feature_ai-powered_business_insights: Ufahamu wa biashara unaoendeshwa na AI
feature_priority_support_with_dedicated_: Msaada wa kipaumbele na meneja wa akaunti aliyeteuliwa
feature_global_payments:_stripe,_paypal,: Malipo ya kimataifa: Stripe, PayPal, na pesa za simu (MTN, M-Pesa, Airtel)
feature_unlimited_users_with_custom_role: Watumiaji wasio na kikomo na majukumu ya kibinafsi
feature_advanced_inventory_management_wi: Udhibiti wa bidhaa wa hali ya juu na aina za kibinafsi
feature_fully_branded_invoicing_with_aut: Ankara kamili za kutengenezwa na kiotomatiki
feature_global_payments_with_lowest_tran: Malipo ya kimataifa na ada za muamala za chini zaidi
feature_advanced_payment_scheduling_and_: Upangaji wa malipo wa hali ya juu na ufikiaji wa API
feature_advanced_ai_business_insights_wi: Ufahamu wa biashara wa AI wa hali ya juu pamoja na utabiri
feature_accept_stripe_&_paypal_payments: Kubali malipo ya Stripe na PayPal
feature_mobile_money_payments_(m-pesa,_m: Malipo ya pesa za simu (M-Pesa, MTN, n.k.)
feature_hr_&_crm_modules: Moduli za Rasilimali Watu na CRM
select_plan_description: Chagua mpango unaoendana vizuri na mahitaji ya biashara yako
advanced_api_access: Ufikiaji wa API wa hali ya juu
advanced_security_features: Vipengele vya usalama vya hali ya juu
feature_single_user_account_with_view-on: Akaunti ya mtumiaji mmoja na ufikiaji wa mhasibu wa kuona-tu
feature_basic_income_and_expense_trackin: Ufuatiliaji wa msingi wa mapato na matumizi
feature_up_to_5_customizable_invoice_tem: Hadi violezo 5 vya ankara vinavyoweza kubadilishwa
feature_dashboard_with_basic_financial_o: Dashibodi na muhtasari wa msingi wa kifedha
feature_mobile_money_payment_acceptance: Kukubali malipo ya pesa za simu
feature_5_gb_storage_with_12_months_tran: Hifadhi ya GB 5 na historia ya miamala ya miezi 12
feature_basic_offline_mode_for_inconsist: Hali ya nje ya mtandao ya msingi kwa mtandao usio thabiti
feature_sms_notifications_for_payments_(: Arifa za SMS kwa malipo (kiasi cha kikomo)
feature_qr_code_generation_for_payments: Utengenezaji wa msimbo wa QR kwa malipo
feature_whatsapp_receipt_delivery_to_cus: Uwasilishaji wa risiti za WhatsApp kwa wateja (kikomo)
feature_mobile-optimized_experience_with: Uzoefu ulioimarishwa kwa simu na kupiga picha
feature_email_support_in_local_languages: Msaada wa barua pepe katika lugha za mtaa
feature_regional_payment_method_guides: Miongozo ya njia za malipo za kikanda
feature_basic_offline_mode: Hali ya nje ya mtandao ya msingi
heroSubtitle: Bure milele kwa vipengele vya msingi
heroTrustedBy: Inaaminika na biashara zaidi ya 10,000 duniani kote
feature_inventory_desc: Fuatilia viwango vya hisa, tengeneza barcodi, na simamia maeneo mengi kwa sasisho za wakati halisi.
feature_pos_desc: Pokea malipo, simamia mauzo, na fuatilia hesabu kutoka mfumo wa POS rahisi kutumia.
feature_invoicing_desc: Unda ankara za kitaalamu, nukuu, na bili za mara kwa mara kwa sekunde. Lipwa haraka zaidi.
feature_payroll_desc: Lipa wafanyakazi, simamia faida, fuatilia likizo, na shughulikia mahitaji yote ya HR mahali pamoja.
feature_accounting_desc: Fuatilia mapato, gharama na tengeneza ripoti za kifedha. Jiandae kwa kodi mwaka mzima.
feature_payments_desc: Pokea kadi za mkopo, uhamisho wa benki, pesa za simu na njia zaidi ya 50 za malipo duniani kote.
feature_crm_desc: Jenga mahusiano ya kudumu na data iliyopangwa ya wateja, vidokezo na historia ya mawasiliano.
feature_analytics_desc: Pata maarifa ya akili na utabiri wa kufanya maamuzi bora ya biashara na uchambuzi unaotumia AI.
faq_a_is_it_really_free: Ndiyo! Mpango wetu wa Msingi ni bure milele bila hitaji la kadi ya mkopo. Inajumuisha vipengele muhimu kwa wafanyabiashara huru na biashara ndogo za kuanza. Unaweza kuboresha wakati wowote biashara yako inavyokua.
faq_q_can_i_switch_plans: Je, ninaweza kubadilisha mpango wakati wowote?
faq_a_can_i_switch_plans: Kabisa! Unaweza kuboresha au kudidimiza mpango wako wakati wowote. Mabadiliko yanaanza mara moja na tutahesabu malipo yoyote kwa uwiano. Hakuna mikataba ya muda mrefu au ada za kufuta.
faq_a_do_you_offer_mobile_apps: Ndiyo! Dott inafanya kazi kikamilifu kwenye kifaa chochote kupitia kivinjari chako cha wavuti. Pia tuna programu maalum za iOS na Android za kusimamia biashara yako ukiwa safarini. Vipengele vyote vinasawazisha kwa wakati halisi kati ya vifaa.
pricing_plan_basic_desc: Kamili kwa wafanyabiashara huru na biashara za kuanza
cta_subtitle: Jiunge na biashara zaidi ya 10,000 zinazotumia Dott tayari
cta_no_credit_card: Hakuna hitaji la kadi ya mkopo
testimonial_subtitle: Jiunge na maelfu ya biashara zenye furaha
integration_title: Inafanya kazi na zana unazotumia tayari
integration_subtitle: Unganisha Dott na programu zako unazozipenda
security_badge_1: Usimbaji fiche wa kiwango cha benki

footer.tagline: Kufanya usimamizi wa biashara kuwa rahisi na wenye ufanisi kwa makampuni duniani kote.

faq.heading: Maswali yanayoulizwa mara kwa mara
faq.subheading: Pata majibu ya maswali ya kawaida kuhusu jukwaa letu na huduma.

global.question: Je, Dott inafanya kazi kwa biashara nje ya Marekani?
global.answer: Ndiyo, Dott imeundwa kufanya kazi kimataifa. Tunaunga mkono sarafu nyingi, lugha, na njia za malipo za kikanda. Jukwaa letu linatii sheria za kodi katika nchi mbalimbali, likikuruhusu kuendesha biashara yako popote duniani.

cost.question: Inagharimu kiasi gani?
cost.answer: Tunatoa miweka tofauti ya bei kulingana na mahitaji ya biashara yako. Mpango wetu wa msingi unaanza kwa $9.99/mwezi, wakati mpango wa premium ulio na vipengele vya hali ya juu unagharimu $29.99/mwezi. Mipango yote inajumuisha vipengele vya msingi kama usimamizi wa bidhaa, ankara, na ripoti za msingi. Tembelea ukurasa wetu wa bei kwa mulinganisho wa kina.

onboarding.question: Inachukua muda gani kuanza?
onboarding.answer: Biashara nyingi huanza na Dott kwa muda wa chini ya siku moja. Mchakato wetu rahisi wa kuweka husaidia katika utaratibu, na timu yetu ya mafanikio ya wateja iko tayari kusaidia ikiwa unahitaji msaada. Ikiwa unahama kutoka mfumo mwingine, tunatoa zana za kuingiza data yako iliyopo.

support.question: Mnatoa aina gani ya msaada?
support.answer: Tunatoa msaada wa wateja saa 24/7 kupitia mazungumzo, barua pepe, na simu. Timu yetu inapatikana kwa lugha nyingi ili kusaidia biashara katika majira ya saa tofauti. Mipango ya premium inajumuisha wameneja wa akaunti waalifu na msaada wa kipaumbele.

data.question: Je, data ya biashara yangu ni salama?
data.answer: Ndiyo, tunachukua usalama kwa umakini. Dott hutumia usimbaji fiche wa kiwango cha benki kulinda data yako, ukaguzi wa usalama wa mara kwa mara, na kutii GDPR na sheria nyingine za ulinzi wa data za kikanda. Data ya biashara yako inawekwa kwa usalama kwenye wingu na kuhifadhiwa mara kwa mara.

integration.question: Je, ninaweza kuunganisha na zana nyingine ninazotumia?
integration.answer: Kabisa. Dott inaunganishwa na wachakataji malipo maarufu, programu za uhasibu, majukwaa ya biashara ya elektroniki, na zana nyingine za biashara. Pia tunatoa API kwa miunganisho ya kibinafsi. Angalia ukurasa wetu wa miunganisho kwa orodha kamili ya huduma zinazotumika.

signin.title: Ingia kwenye akaunti yako

signin.description: Fikia dashibodi ya biashara yako na uendelee kukuza kampuni yako na zana zetu kamilifu.

signin.uptime: Dhamana ya muda wa kutenda kazi

signup.benefit3: Ripoti na uchanganuzi wa hali ya juu
signup.testimonial: PyFactor imebadilisha jinsi tunavyosimamia shughuli za biashara yetu.

verify.title: Thibitisha Barua pepe Yako

verify.description: Tumetuma nambari ya uthibitishaji kwenye barua pepe yako. Tafadhali angalia sanduku lako la barua pepe na uingize nambari hapa chini.
verify.step1: Angalia sanduku lako la barua pepe
verify.securityNote: Uthibitishaji wa barua pepe unatusaidia kuhakikisha usalama wa akaunti yako na kuzuia ufikiaji usioruhusiwa.

hero.title: Blogu ya Biashara ya Dott
hero.subtitle: Jifunze kuhusu kusimamia fedha za biashara yako na Dott. Pata vidokezo, maarifa, na mikakati ya kukuza biashara yako.

newsletter.title: Jiandikishe kwa jarida letu kwa masasisho ya bidhaa na machapisho mapya ya blogu!

blog.noArticles: Hakuna makala zilizopatikana zinazolingana na vigezo vyako.

profitLoss.title: Kuelewa Faida na Hasara: Mwongozo wa Kufurahisha kwa Wamiliki wa Biashara
profitLoss.excerpt: Gundua jinsi ya kusoma na kuelewa taarifa yako ya P&L bila kulala. Tunaahidi kuifanya iwe ya kuvutia!

status.supportInfo: Ukipata matatizo, tafadhali angalia ukurasa huu kwanza kwa usumbufu wowote unaojulikana wa huduma.

builtForYou.title: Imejengwa Kwa Ajili Yako
builtForYou.heading: Simamia biashara yako kama Mtaalamu!
builtForYou.subheading: Imejengwa kwa wamiliki biashara kama wewe
builtForYou.cta: Jiunge na maelfu ya wamiliki biashara duniani kote wanaomwamini Dott kusimamia biashara zao

freelancers.title: Wafanyakazi Huru
freelancers.description: Fuatilia miradi, tuma bili kwa wateja mara moja, na simamia fedha zako mahali pamoja. Pata malipo haraka zaidi kwa ankara za kitaalamu.

contractors.title: Makandarasi
contractors.description: Simamia miradi mingi, fuatilia gharama za vifaa na kazi, na tuma makadirio ya kitaalamu. Weka mtiririko wako wa fedha taslimu wenye afya.

entrepreneurs.title: Wajasiriamali
entrepreneurs.description: Panua kampuni yako chipukizi kwa zana zenye nguvu za hesabu, mauzo, na ufuatiliaji wa fedha. Fanya maamuzi yanayotokana na data.

consultants.title: Washauri
consultants.description: Toza kwa saa au mradi, fuatilia matumizi, na simamia wateja wengi bila shida. Kutoa ankara za kitaalamu kumejumuishwa.

retail.title: Wamiliki wa Maduka ya Rejareja
retail.description: Simamia hesabu kwa kupima msimbo wa pau, fuatilia mauzo, na pokea njia nyingi za malipo ikijumuisha pesa za simu.

streetVendors.title: Wachuuzi wa Mitaani
streetVendors.description: Muundo rahisi wa kwanza-simu kufuatilia mauzo ya kila siku, kusimamia hesabu na kupokea malipo ya kidijitali ukiwa safarini.

marketStalls.title: Wamiliki wa Vibanda vya Soko
marketStalls.description: Kamili kwa siku za soko zenye shughuli nyingi. Uingizaji wa mauzo wa haraka, tahadhari za hesabu na ufuatiliaji wa faida za kila siku katika sarafu yako ya mtaa.

mobileMoneyAgents.title: Mawakala wa Pesa za Simu
mobileMoneyAgents.description: Fuatilia miamala, simamia mizania ya float na tengeneza ripoti kwa waendeshaji wa mitandao. Imejengwa kwa M-Pesa, MTN na zaidi.

restaurants.title: Wamiliki wa Mikahawa Midogo
restaurants.description: Simamia maagizo, fuatilia viungo, hesabu gharama za chakula na shughulikia vyakula vya kuliwa na vya kuchukua kwa ufanisi.

serviceProviders.title: Watoa Huduma
serviceProviders.description: Kwa mafundi bomba, wahandisi umeme, mafundi na wengine. Panga kazi, fuatilia sehemu na tuma ankara baada ya kukamilika.

onlineSellers.title: Wauzaji wa Mtandaoni
onlineSellers.description: Sawazisha hesabu katika majukwaa yote, simamia maagizo na fuatilia usafirishaji. Kamili kwa wauzaji wa mitandao ya kijamii.

transport.title: Waendeshaji wa Usafiri
transport.description: Kwa madereva wa teksi, boda boda na bajaji. Fuatilia mapato ya kila siku, gharama za mafuta na ratiba za matengenezo.

cookieBanner.title: Ilani ya Vidakuzi
cookieBanner.message: Tunatumia vidakuzi kuboresha matumizi yako, kuchambua matumizi, na kutoa utendaji muhimu. Kwa kuendelea kutumia tovuti yetu, unakubali matumizi yetu ya vidakuzi.

essential.title: Vidakuzi Muhimu
essential.description: Vinahitajika kwa utendaji wa msingi wa tovuti na usalama

analytics.title: Vidakuzi vya Uchanganuzi
analytics.description: Kutusaidia kuelewa jinsi unavyotumia tovuti yetu

termsOfService.title: Terms of Use
termsOfService.introduction: Welcome to Dott, a service provided by Dott LLC. This Terms of Use Agreement ("Agreement") governs your use of the Dott website, mobile applications, and all related services offered by Dott LLC. By accessing or using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By registering for and/or using Dott in any manner, including but not limited to visiting or browsing the website or downloading the application, you agree to be bound by this Agreement, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing Dott. The materials contained in Dott are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.

service.title: 2. Description of Service
service.content: Dott is a comprehensive financial management platform that provides businesses with tools for accounting, payroll, payment processing, invoicing, and financial insights. Our services include subscription-based access to our software, payment processing capabilities, payroll services, and invoice factoring in select regions. The specific features available to you may depend on your subscription level, geographical location, and applicable laws and regulations.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: To access most features of Dott, you must register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete. You are responsible for safeguarding your password and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify Dott LLC immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. Dott LLC cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with the above requirements.

payments.title: 4. Subscription and Payments
payments.content: Dott offers various subscription plans and payment services. By subscribing to our services, you agree to pay the applicable fees as they become due. Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis depending on your selected billing cycle. When you register for a paid service, you must provide accurate and complete information for a valid payment method that you are authorized to use.

recurring.title: 4.1 Recurring Billing
recurring.content: By subscribing to Dott services, you authorize us to charge the payment method you provide to us on a recurring basis. If we are unable to charge your payment method for any reason, we reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the paid services.

processing.title: 4.2 Payment Processing
processing.content: Dott uses third-party payment processors including Stripe, Flutterwave, DLocal, Wise, PayPal, and others to process transactions. Your use of these payment services is subject to the applicable payment processor's terms of service and privacy policy. Dott charges a transaction fee for payment processing services as outlined in our pricing page.

refunds.title: 4.3 Refunds
refunds.content: All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise specified or required by applicable law. If you believe you've been charged in error, please contact our customer support team.

conduct.title: 5. User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree to use Dott only for lawful purposes and in accordance with this Agreement. You agree not to use Dott:

violations.law: In any way that violates any applicable federal, state, local, or international law or regulation.
violations.material: To transmit any material that is unlawful, threatening, abusive, libelous, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.
violations.impersonation: To impersonate or attempt to impersonate Dott LLC, a Dott LLC employee, another user, or any other person or entity.
violations.interference: To engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the services (or the servers and networks connected to the services).
violations.security: To attempt to circumvent any security measures implemented by Dott LLC.
violations.financial: For money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other illegal financial activities.

financial.title: 6. Payment and Financial Services
financial.content: Dott enables users to process payments, manage payroll, and access financial services through various third-party providers. When using these services, you agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including those related to financial transactions, anti-money laundering requirements, and data privacy.

processing.title: 6.1 Payment Processing
processing.content: Use of our payment processing features is subject to the terms of service of our payment partners. You are responsible for ensuring all payment information provided is accurate and that you are authorized to use the payment methods you provide.

factoring.title: 6.2 Invoice Factoring
factoring.content: Where available, Dott offers invoice factoring services subject to additional terms and eligibility requirements. These services are currently only available in the United States and Canada. By using our invoice factoring services, you authorize Dott LLC to verify your business information, credit history, and other relevant details.

international.title: 6.3 International Transactions
international.content: For international transactions, you acknowledge that currency conversion rates and additional fees may apply. Dott LLC is not responsible for any fees charged by your financial institution or any third-party payment processors.

data.title: 7. Data and Content
data.content: You retain all rights to your data uploaded to Dott. By using our services, you grant Dott LLC a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, process, and display your data solely for the purpose of providing and improving our services. We will maintain appropriate administrative, physical, and technical safeguards to protect your data.

processing.title: 7.1 Data Processing
processing.content: As part of providing our services, Dott processes financial and personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. You acknowledge that Dott may use third-party service providers to process data on our behalf.

security.title: 7.2 Data Security
security.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for restricting access to your computer or device. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

contact.title: 21. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact us at:
